title: Question:
author: Dnlhwrd3229
content: Need a  of 300 until March 3 ...I will pay back 330 if I could

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: Dnlhwrd3229 on February 28, 2023, 10:00:13 AMI will pay back 330 if I could"If"  If you could?!?   This is one of the worst things to said for asking a loan  .... did you have also a collateral for this request? You go to bank and ask for a loan in such way, probably they will just call local police or a good MD.Without a collateral, I am pretty sure no one will take such risk providing a loan to a complete unknown account

comments.author: bias
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on February 28, 2023, 12:53:30 PMas a newbie we have no rights on a possible loan   You mean "on a possible uncollateralized loan". Yes, you don't have any rights at all, if you don't offer collateral.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Dnlhwrd3229 on February 28, 2023, 10:00:13 AMNeed a  of 300 until March 3 ...I will pay back 330 if I couldSure!Lucky for you, you have yourself here a very good Samaritan who has some Bitcoins at disposal to lend out to brand-new profiles of internet strangers that need a loan with no-collateral.Drop me your bitcoin address and I will send the money right away!
